MANNY3.original: ~s~Get in a vehicle.
~s~The ~r~target~s~ got into that car. Follow him.
~s~Drive to the ~y~Algonquin Bridge.
~s~Get closer to the ~r~targets~s~ car or you'll lose him.
~s~Keep close to the ~r~train~s~ and follow it as it goes over the bridges.
MANNY3.translated: ~s~跟紧从桥上驶过的~r~列车~s~过桥后跟住它。~s~

MANNY3.original: ~s~The ~r~train~s~ has stopped.
~s~The target is on that train. Follow the ~r~train~s~ and take him out when he gets off.
MANNY3.translated: ~s~目标在那辆列车上。跟着~r~列车，~s~在他下车后干掉他。

MANNY3.original: ~s~Go to the ~y~Algonquin Bridge.
~s~You are too close to the ~r~targets~s~ car, back off.
MANNY3.translated: ~s~你离~r~目标~s~的车太近了，退后点。

MANNY3.original: ~r~You lost the train.~s~
~r~The target got away.~s~
Hold ~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~ to focus on the train.
~s~The ~r~train~s~ has stopped.
~s~Go to the ~y~Algonquin Bridge.
~s~The target didn't get off here. Follow the ~r~train~s~ to the next station.
MANNY3.translated: ~s~目标还没下车。跟着~r~列车~s~到下个车站。

MANNY3.original: ~s~Get closer to the ~r~train,~s~ or you will lose it.
The chase camera will focus on the target you are pursuing allowing you track their movements.
MANNY3.translated: 追逐视角会将镜头对准目标，便于观察其行进方向。

MANNY3.original: ~s~The ~r~target~s~ got off the train.
~s~Take out the ~r~targets.
~s~Get closer to the ~r~target,~s~ or you will lose them.
